it's not something that we don't

now if you're a postal worker and we're

if you are a postal worker it's your
mission to deliver the mail effectively
- it's like destination
that's easy if it's a letter but if it's
a parcel it's
not always so straightforward and some
of you may have experience receiving a
card in the mail instead of the parcel
that you were looking forward to and
likely got pretty upset about that and
for that reason it's a huge top priority
for Australia Post they really want to
reduce the carding rate so that people
get their parcels and so we work
together with them to come up with a
solution and what we came up with was a
virtual reality experience where the
user puts on a headset they're
transported to a given street location
and then they're able to look at all the
houses and properties in that spot as
they look at a property the heads-up
display comes up in their field of
vision and shows them helpful
information to make the delivery such as
when the occupants are likely to be home
and if there are any dangers or risks in
delivering it and so on we'll show you a
demo in a moment now that was great
